title: Curfew will be lifted at 7.00 am, will re-imposed at 2.00 pm: PMD
body_lines: The police curfew which is currently in force, will be lifted at 7.00 m tomorrow, the President's media division (PMD) said.
They also said that the curfew will be re-imposed at 2.00 pm on the same day and will remain until 6.00 am on Friday (13).
